recipesJson.name: Dude.. Wheres My Lemons?
recipesJson.author: WhoIsJayson
recipesJson.description:
I wondered what would happen if I removed the strawberry's from "My Dude" and added in some Lemon and Meringue... Pure magic happened!! I love it. It's only about 12hours old but its delicious!

Lemon Meringue Ice Cream

reviews.text: Really good flavor! I noticed some muting after it steeped for a long time, but it is nice as a shake and vape, and it get really really good after a 1 week steep. Great work! PS - i lowered the sweetener percentage a bit in my batch.
First decent lemon vape I ever encountered, thanks
This is fantastic! I really enjoy this as a lemon vape, it vapes just as advertised and i let it go for a week. Thanks for sharing!

This is a winner in my book.  Kind of a basic lemon cream recipe but its so good.  Let it steep for a week and brought it to work and everyone really liked it.  I've been looking for a good sweet lemon cream for a while and never seem to get what I'm looking for.  I dropped the sweetener down just out of personal preference. Definitely be making more of this in the future.  Good adaptation.
Bro you have a good adaptation here
Mixed it up last night. Not bad! I also suggest trying Wayne's Funfetti recipe and adding 3% FA Lemon Sicily for a lemon vanilla cake effect. This recipe reminds me of that
